name: Craze
description:
'Craze' Is a competitive rhythm game made for the game jam theme- "mad."

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Two players stand on either side of the game table, each belonging to one side. Music will play and notes will appear on the board in according to the beat. The closer you hit the note to the beat the more points you will earn, a circle will close in around the note to help you get the perfect timing. Perfect timing will get you the most points, while hitting off-beat will get you few points. The player with the most points by the end of the song wins.

Whilst the game is not fully functional, we uploaded what we were able to finish. Tis but a minor detail.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
